replies.body:
All Rotating game modes are available 11am - 3am EST Friday-Sunday.

URF got a special exemption last time because and never closed because it was URF and it was the long weekend.
That doesn't make any sense.... Why only have it available during certain hours?

was also pretty disappointed.
my final game before it went down was still like a 30 second queue, I don't know why they bother to turn it off when it is pretty clear people are gonna be up on a friday/saturday night all night wanting to play urf.
my current sleep schedule is reversed and now i'm stuck here with no urf to play until 9am?
Yeah, it's 3:26 AM here and I just finished my second game of it, went to que up again and it was gone. I thought it was supposed to be for the whole weekend?
It is, but it only runs between the hours of 11am and 3pm.
